head.title: Artificial Intelligence and the Art of Mario Klingemann - FutArtistic Hub
head.description: This is an article about the German Artist Mario Klingemann, known for his work in combining art with neural networks, code, and algorithms.
head.keywords: art, technology, future, artists, photographers, painters, developers, art-lovers, future-lovers, technology-lovers
